snippet: Gen. John R. Allen, who departs next month, created an international coalition to fight the Islamic State, but his plan did not foresee Russian intervention.
abstract: Obama administration formally announces Gen John R Allen's planned resignation and that his replacement will be Brett McGurk, Allen's State Dept deputy; Allen had been tasked with assembling international coalition to fight Islamic State group, but now administration faces challenge of bolstering its coalition even as Russia has assembled its own international coalition.
